GSD.description:
staging: wfx: fix an error handling in wfx_init_common()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit 9727912e906762a63c1a667c84731d3427653f88. For more details please see the references link.
